item.title: CVE-2019-18576|2024-09-16T17:58:07.064Z -- dell -- xtremio
item.description: Dell EMC XtremIO XMS versions prior to 6.3.0 contain an information disclosure vulnerability where OS usersâ€™ passwords are logged in local files. Malicious local users with access to the log files may use the exposed passwords to gain access to XtremIO with the privileges of the compromised user.
